weekly_top_story.headline: Federal Government Shutdown Halts Key Medicare Telehealth and Hospital-at-Home Programs
weekly_top_story.summary: The ongoing federal government shutdown has caused the expiration of temporary but increasingly popular Medicare telehealth and hospital-at-home programs, significantly impacting access to care for millions of Medicare beneficiaries, especially in rural areas.

stories.headline: FDA Expands Early Alert Recall Program to Cover All Medical Devices
stories.summary: The FDA has broadened its early alert recall program from a pilot covering five device types to all medical devices to reduce the time between identifying high-risk device issues and warning the public.

stories.headline: Startup Kneu Health Raises $5.6M to Monitor Parkinson’s Disease Symptoms via Smartphone
stories.summary: Kneu Health, a new startup from Oxford University, secured $5.6 million in funding for its smartphone app that tracks movement, speech, and cognitive changes in Parkinson’s patients, supporting improved symptom management.
